item.title: 'Emergency' trailer 2: Kangana Ranaut makes a hard-hitting impact as Indira Gandhi as the film promises t - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Emergency' Trailer 2: Kangana Ranaut's Hard-Hitting Portrayal of Indira Gandhi

Publication Date: [Date not provided] | Source: [Source not provided]

This long-awaited film, set to release on January 17, 2025, marks the 50th anniversary of India's emergency declaration in 1975. The trailer showcases Kangana's transformation into Indira Gandhi, highlighting the gripping narrative the film promises to deliver.

  • The release was delayed due to censor board issues but has now received a U/A certification with suggested cuts.
  • The trailer depicts how Gandhi declared an 'Emergency' in India, emphasizing her powerful dialogue.
  • Kangana expressed gratitude for finally bringing this significant story to the big screen, especially as it resonates with current themes.
  • The film features Anupam Kher, Shreyas Talpade, and Milind Soman among others.
Kangana Ranaut: "This story isn't just about a controversial leader; it delves into themes that remain profoundly relevant today."

Overall, 'Emergency' aims to not only tell a historical tale but also provoke reflection on constitutional resilience.

item.title: Golden Globes 2025 live updates: No wins for India as All We Imagine As Light gets snubbed in both categories - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Golden Globes 2025 live updates: No wins for India as All We Imagine As Light gets snubbed in both categories

Date: January 5, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The 2025 Golden Globes saw significant recognition for various films, but India's entry, All We Imagine As Light, left the ceremony without any wins after being nominated in two categories.

  • Leading the nominations was Emilia Pérez with 10 nominations.
  • The ceremony took place on January 5, airing live and attracting significant viewership.
  • Despite nominations, India did not secure any awards.
“India didn’t win any awards despite being nominated in two categories.”

The Golden Globes continue to adapt after previous controversies, aiming for a more engaging and entertaining show.

item.title: Golden Globes 2025 Complete Winners' List: The Brutalist, Emilia Perez and Shogun sweep top honours in st - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Golden Globes 2025 Complete Winners' List

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The 82nd Golden Globes showcased notable wins for films and performances, with Emilia Perez and The Brutalist emerging as significant victors during the ceremony.

  • Emilia Perez secured multiple awards, including Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy and Best Non-English Language Film.
  • Demi Moore won Best Actress in a Comedy for her role in The Substance.
  • Sebastian Stan took the award for Best Actor in a Comedy for A Different Man.
  • The Brutalist won Best Motion Picture - Drama and Best Director for Brady Corbet.
  • Shogun dominated the television categories, winning Best Television Series (Drama).
"That belief corroded me over time... but then this magical, bold, courageous, out-of-the-box script called The Substance came across my desk, and the universe told me, 'You’re not done.'" - Demi Moore

The Golden Globes set the stage for Oscar buzz, with competitive races expected for the upcoming Academy Awards.

item.title: Chandramukhi makers send legal notice to Nayanthara – Here is what happened - 123telugu
item.description:
Chandramukhi Producers File Legal Notice Against Nayanthara

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: 123 Telugu

Nayanthara, known as the “Lady Superstar,” is facing legal complications following the release of her wedding documentary, Nayanthara: Beyond the Fairytale, on Netflix.

  • Dhanush has filed a lawsuit against Nayanthara, her husband Vignesh Shivan, and Netflix for using copyrighted material from his film.
  • The demand for compensation is set at Rs. 10 crore for the unauthorized use of a few seconds of footage.
  • The producers of Chandramukhi have sent a legal notice demanding Rs. 5 crore for using a clip from their film without permission.
  • Fans are eagerly waiting for Nayanthara's response to these legal challenges.
Dhanush demands Rs. 10 crore for the unauthorized use of his clip from Naanum Rowdy Dhaan.

This situation is developing, and updates will follow as Nayanthara's response becomes available.

item.title: Aamir Khan's son Junaid Khan makes a BIG revelation, was diagnosed with…., his parents never knew until… - India.com
item.description:
Aamir Khan's son Junaid Khan makes a BIG revelation about his dyslexia diagnosis

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India.com

Junaid Khan, son of Bollywood star Aamir Khan, recently revealed that he was diagnosed with dyslexia at the age of 6, with his parents unaware until they read the script of the film 'Taare Zameen Par'.

  • Junaid Khan made his film debut in 'Maharaj' and is set to star in 'Loveyapa'.
  • His struggles with dyslexia were only brought to light when his parents recognized the storyline from 'Taare Zameen Par'.
  • He credits the support and understanding of his parents for helping him navigate his diagnosis.
  • Junaid emphasized a focus on overall development rather than just academic success.
  • 'Loveyapa' is scheduled for release on February 7, 2025.
“When they heard the script of Taare Zameen Par, they were like, ‘Ek second… We have seen this in our lives.’”

In conclusion, Junaid Khan’s open discussion about his dyslexia highlights the importance of understanding and support in overcoming personal challenges.

item.title: Deleted post by Toxic makers sparks discussion - 123telugu
item.description:
Discussion Sparks Over Deleted Post by Toxic Makers

Publication Date: Latest Telugu cinema news

Rocking Star Yash is set to excite his audience with the upcoming film Toxic, directed by Geetu Mohandas, following the success of the KGF franchise.

  • The production house KVN Productions recently made a social media post about an update regarding Toxic.
  • The post was deleted quickly, leading to speculation among fans who captured screenshots of it.
  • There is widespread anticipation that a promo might be released for Yash’s birthday on January 8, 2025.
  • The film features a star-studded cast, including Kiara Advani, Nayanthara, Huma Qureshi, and Tara Sutaria.
  • Toxic is described as a high-octane gangster drama, produced on a grand scale.
“The buzz grew after the production house posted and quickly deleted an update, leaving fans curious about the reason behind the move.”

The excitement around Toxic continues to build as fans eagerly await more information and updates from the production team.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan faces criticism for her interaction with daughter Aaradhya at Mumbai Airport - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai Bachchan Faces Criticism for Interaction with Daughter Aaradhya at Mumbai Airport

Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

Bollywood actress Aishwarya Rai Bachchan has come under scrutiny for her behavior during a recent public appearance with her daughter, Aaradhya, at the Mumbai Airport.

  • The interaction sparked discussions on social media.
  • Critics have expressed various opinions regarding celebrity parenting in public spaces.
  • The event highlights the challenges of maintaining a private life in the public eye.
“Being a celebrity does not come with a manual for parenting in public,” commented a social media user.

The backlash demonstrates the intense scrutiny public figures face, particularly regarding their family dynamics.

item.title: Virgo Horoscope for January 2025 - Astrology Zone
item.description:
Virgo Horoscope for January 2025

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: Astrology Zone

Dear Reader, Susan Miller shares important astrological insights for Virgo in January 2025, focusing on career developments and love prospects.

  • Jupiter’s influence in career could lead to major achievements.
  • Important developments may have occurred near the full moon on December 15.
  • February 4 to June 9 is a promising time for career advancements.
  • This month is ideal for love, especially during the first ten days influenced by the new moon.
  • Single individuals are encouraged to socialize and seek romantic connections.
“I am excited about your possibilities, and I will show you why.”

Overall, January 2025 presents exceptional opportunities for Virgos, both in their careers and love lives.

item.title: Aquarius Horoscope for January 2025 - Astrology Zone
item.description:
Aquarius Horoscope for January 2025

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: Astrology Zone

This January, Aquarius individuals are encouraged to find peace and reflect on their priorities as they begin the new year. The month's astrological influences suggest a focus on financial stability.

  • Readers are introduced to the new astrological influences at the start of January 2025.
  • The Capricorn new moon on December 30 affects Aquarians, promoting introspection and intuition.
  • Saturn's influence suggests important lessons about finances and stability.
  • Individuals are advised to take their time in addressing financial concerns as the focus will continue into February.
“You have been living with a lot of hustle-bustle, and as you enter January, you are craving a little peace to collect your thoughts.”

The January horoscope for Aquarius encourages self-reflection and a thoughtful approach to finances, setting the stage for a stable year ahead.

item.title: No Jr NTR Mention: Strict 'Unstoppable' Rule.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
No Jr NTR Mention: Strict 'Unstoppable' Rule

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Not specified

This article discusses the absence of Jr. NTR’s mention in the Unstoppable show with Balakrishna, highlighting the show's guest list and underlying tensions.

  • Many film stars have appeared as guests on the show, including well-known names like Venkatesh and Pawan Kalyan.
  • Jr. NTR's name has been notably absent, with restrictions placed on its mention by guests.
  • Rumors suggest tensions between Balakrishna and Nagarjuna may be affecting the show.
  • Chiranjeevi, a friend of Nagarjuna, has also not appeared on the program.
  • Insiders indicate that the strained relationship between Balakrishna and Jr. NTR is a factor in this silence.
“There have been open discussions about the strained relationship between Balakrishna and Jr. NTR.”

The strict rules regarding Jr. NTR’s mention may indicate deeper issues within Tollywood that reflect ongoing rivalries and relationships.

item.title: Capricorn Horoscope for January 2025 - Astrology Zone
item.description:
Capricorn Horoscope for January 2025

Date: January 2025 Source: Astrology Zone

Dear Reader, Susan Miller shares insights for Capricorn in January 2025, emphasizing the importance of setting personal priorities during a month of self-reflection and growth.

  • A new moon in Capricorn presents opportunities to fulfill personal desires.
  • Capricorns are encouraged to balance their serious nature with small pleasures.
  • Focus on long-term projects and intentions, influenced by Saturn's stability.
“Your gift is to think big and aim high, but at the same time to always keep your dreams within realistic parameters.”

This January, Capricorns are invited to reflect on their needs while planning for a future filled with emotional enrichment and stability.

item.title: Birthday throwback: When Diljit Dosanjh said, 'Hogi Rihanna, hogi Beyonce' for Kareena Kapoor; she reacte - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Birthday throwback: When Diljit Dosanjh said, "Hogi Rihanna, hogi Beyonce" for Kareena Kapoor; she reacted

Publication Date: Today

Source: Times of India

Diljit Dosanjh turns a year older today, reminiscing the viral moment during a wedding performance where he called Kareena Kapoor on stage. Their camaraderie continued in an Instagram live session promoting their film, Crew.

  • Diljit’s memorable statement during the wedding: "Hogi Rihanna, hogi Beyonce, sadi ta ae he hai, Kareena."
  • Kareena's enthusiastic declaration in the Instagram live about being there for Diljit.
  • Diljit discusses India’s potential to host a festival greater than Coachella with PM Narendra Modi, citing rich cultural diversity.
  • PM Modi's vision of making India the center of the world's creative industry.
“We can make it much bigger. People travel from all over the world for such festivals.” - Diljit Dosanjh

This birthday throwback enriches the legacy of Diljit Dosanjh, showcasing the interplay of music, culture, and celebrity interactions.

item.title: Horoscope Today, January 6, 2025: Check here Astrological predictions for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Horoscope Today, January 6, 2025: Check here Astrological predictions for all zodiac signs

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 Source: India Today

Find answers to your deepest burning questions related to love, health, money, and career in the daily horoscope for all zodiac signs.

  • Aries: Increased spending; patience in career; alert in finances.
  • Taurus: Seizing financial opportunities; steady profits; supportive friends.
  • Gemini: Positive influence from elders; successful career; desire to communicate.
  • Cancer: Luck on your side; achieving goals; engaging in public welfare.
  • Leo: Proceed with caution; support from partners; focus on hard work.
  • Virgo: Advancing family matters; clarity in transactions; strong managerial trust.
  • Libra: Better outcomes from efforts; mixed work conditions; personal achievements focus.
  • Scorpio: Enthusiasm with collaborators; focus on goals; improve personal relationships.
  • Sagittarius: Emphasize family; focus on tasks; maintain humility.
  • Capricorn: Take initiative; excel in social endeavors; strengthen relationships.
  • Aquarius: Focus on family; increase wealth and property interests; strengthen management.
  • Pisces: Display talent; create joyful moments; engage in creative tasks.

Published By: Ayush Bisht

Published On: January 6, 2025

item.title: Massive update on WWE RAW ahead of Netflix premiere (Exclusive) - Sportskeeda
item.description:
Massive update on WWE RAW ahead of Netflix premiere (Exclusive)

Publication Date: January 5, 2025
Source: Sportskeeda Wrestling

WWE RAW is all set to make its Netflix debut this week, marking a historic moment for the show known for its iconic moments over the past three decades.

  • WWE RAW will premiere on Netflix, moving from the USA Network.
  • The premiere is scheduled for January 6, 2025, featuring high-profile matches.
  • Notable matches include John Cena's return, Seth Rollins vs. CM Punk, and Roman Reigns vs. Solo Sikoa in Tribal Combat.
  • Netflix will provide an on-demand option for viewers, allowing for rewinding and fast-forwarding during live shows.
  • The event is highly anticipated amidst WWE's promotional efforts.
“It will be interesting to see if this partnership kicks off on a high note come January 6.”

This Netflix premiere is poised to reshape the viewing experience for WWE fans, combining iconic wrestling with modern streaming flexibility.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box office Day 32: The Allu Arjun starrer earns 7 cr; Baby John struggles to cross the 1 cr mark - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Day 32: The Allu Arjun Starrer Earns 7 Cr; Baby John Struggles to Cross the 1 Cr Mark

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The article discusses the box office performance of 'Pushpa 2', which has earned 7 crores on its 32nd day, while 'Baby John' struggles to reach the 1 crore mark.

  • Pushpa 2 has seen continuous earnings reaching 7 crores a month post-release.
  • Baby John is finding it difficult to gain significant traction at the box office.
“The performance of Pushpa 2 reflects its popularity among audiences.”

The takeaway highlights the stark contrast in the box office performance between the two films, emphasizing the success of 'Pushpa 2' amid tough competition.

item.title: Libra Horoscope Today: January 6, 2025 - VOGUE India
item.description:
Libra Horoscope Today: January 6, 2025

Date & Source: January 6, 2025, Vogue

What your fears are asking you not to do, Libra, is the exact thing your heart says you must do. Fire up that passion, supercharge those ideas, and make a guidebook that takes your forward. Ensure you keep your communication skills light as a feather, to lend a soft blow wherever necessary, because effectiveness doesn't necessarily mean harshness - gentle waters too can break mighty mountains.

  • Cosmic tip: Don’t die in the waters of your overthinking mind.

item.title: Golden Globes 2025 LIVE: ‘Emilia Perez’, ‘The Brutalist’ sweep as ‘Shogun’ culminates winning streak - The Hindu
item.description:
Golden Globes 2025: ‘Emilia Perez’, ‘The Brutalist’ sweep as ‘Shogun’ culminates winning streak

Date: January 06, 2025
Source: The Hindu

The Golden Globes returned with a vibrant ceremony celebrating the best in film and television, featuring key victories for 'Emilia Perez' and 'The Brutalist'.

  • ‘Emilia Perez’ won Best Motion Picture (Musical/Comedy) and a record-breaking ten nominations.
  • ‘The Brutalist’ secured Best Motion Picture (Drama) and took home multiple awards.
  • Jodie Foster won Best Actress in a Limited Series/Anthology Series for 'True Detective'.
  • Nikki Glaser hosted the ceremony, bringing a new energy to the event.
  • The night emphasized Hollywood's revival after recent scandals surrounding the Globes.
“For better or worse, the Globes are back to remind Hollywood why it just can’t look away.”

The Golden Globes continue to shape the awards season, influencing contenders for the Oscars ahead.
